page.pg_title: Topics and objectives for this module

text_content.paragraph: Let’s review the Learning Objectives for this lesson. After completing this module, you will be able to:

bullets.bullet: Export search results to Excel, and
Customize search results by changing which columns to display and grouping by column

text_content.paragraph: On the following page, you’ll learn about the benefits of using the Contracts tab.

page.prompt: CLICK THE NEXT ARROW TO CONTINUE.

cc_text.paragraph: In addition to providing you with some insights about the benefits of using the Contracts tab, you will get a brief overview of the tab. Then, we will describe in more detail how to define a Contracts XRefs search, print contract data sheets, export search results to Excel and customize search results.
After completing this module, you will be able to:

bullets.bullet: Export search results to Excel, and
Customize search results by changing which columns to display and grouping by column
